mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, member_pw as memberPw, member_level as memberLevel, member_name as memberName from tbl_member where member_id = #{memberId} and member_deleted = 0

select member_no as memberNo, member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_name as memberName, member_phone as memberPhone, to_char(member_birth, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as memberBirth, member_email as memberEmail, member_addr_main as memberAddrMain, member_addr_detail as memberAddrDetail, member_profile as memberProfile, total_money as totalMoney, (select sum(donate_money) from tbl_donation_list d where d.member_no = m.member_no ) as totalDonateMoney from tbl_member m where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_name = #{memberName}, member_phone = #{memberPhone}, member_birth = #{memberBirth}, member_Email = #{memberEmail}, member_addr_main = #{memberAddrMain}, member_addr_detail = #{memberAddrDetail} where member_no = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: select member_profile as memberProfile from tbl_member where member_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_member_donation where member_no = #{memberNo} and donate_code in #{donateCode}
mapper.update: update tbl_member set member_deleted = 1, member_profile = null where member_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_member_org where member_no = #{parameter}
